name: Tetro Stacker
description:
Have you found box stacking games just a bit too easy? Do you wish they were a bit more challenging? Well look no further cause this game has you covered. Do your best to stack the highly recognizable tetros from Tetris as high as you can!

Lessons learned from this project:

- Making a box not slide when another box is on top is much harder than it looks, and I still didn't manage to get it right!

- Tetris is grid based for a reason!

What I would change if I did it again?

- Figure out a better way to use the physics engine so the blocks don't bounce when they land and feel more solid.

Best Played Out of Fullscreen

If you want to see more personal projects in the future make sure you follow!

I will be moving onto downloaded executables (Windows Only) as WebGL just isn't working consistently enough for me to trust it.

(This game actually refused to work as a WebGL build)

This project is the result of completing an assignment for Game Development I at the University of Central Missouri. Finished Sept. 24th, 2021
